page.shortlink: api client api a5 chart mapped data point dimension object
page.description: The mapping of raw data into a point.

property.name: base
property.description: The base value of the data point dimension. This is useful for stacked numbers, where the actual value will be the "value" minus the "base".

property.name: value
property.description: The value of the data point dimension. If multiple values are found for a given point then the dimensions "select" property will be responsible for the final value.

property.name: initial
property.description: The initial value(s) the data point dimension.
